com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views.processors

Class SingleEntityFormViewProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views.processors.EntityViewProcessorAdapter
      • com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views.processors.SingleEntityFormViewProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EntityViewProcessor

    @Component
 @Exposed
 @Scope(value="prototype")
public class SingleEntityFormViewProcessor
extends EntityViewProcessorAdapter
    Creates the form based layout for an entity. Will create a column form based structure for the body and will replace the default container by the left form column. The page title will be set for the selected entity, or the "create new" title will be used if no entity set. The form itself will have no default action set, and will always submit to the current page.

    If setAddDefaultButtons(boolean) is true, a default save and cancel button will be added at the bottom of the form. The cancel button will return to the entity overview page, unless a specific from request attribute is present.

    If setAddGlobalBindingErrors(boolean) is true (default), any global errors on the BindingResult will be added above the two form columns.

    If the current view attributes (EntityViewRequest.getConfigurationAttributes() contains a ATTR_ENCTYPE, its value will be used as the enctype for the form. If no value is set but a collection of property descriptors is available (PropertyRenderingViewProcessor.ATTRIBUTE_PROPERTY_DESCRIPTORS on the view, the descriptors will be inspected for the same attribute. This is especially useful to automatically change the form enctype to multipart when a property requiring it (usually a file) is present.

    The form will also contain a hidden form element named from if it was passed in originally as request parameter. It is expected to contain the original url that should be redirected back to in case of cancellation.

    Since:
    2.0.0
    Author:
    Arne Vandamme

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String ATTR_ENCTYPE
      Holds the form enctype value that should be used, either present on the EntityViewFactory attributes or on a EntityPropertyDescriptor.
      static String FORM
      Name of the root form container that contains the rows.
      static String FORM_BUTTONS
      Name of the container that holds the default buttons.
      static String LEFT_COLUMN
      Default name of the left column element in case of a default form with a 2 column grid.
      static String RIGHT_COLUMN
      Default name of the right column element in case of a default form with a 2 column grid.

      • setGrid

        public SingleEntityFormViewProcessor setGrid(Grid grid)
        Grid for the form (represents the columns the form should have). Defaults to 2 columns of the same width. Use for example Grid.create( Grid.Width.FULL ) to get a single full with column. Every column container will be a ContainerViewElement with the name entityForm-column-COLUMN_NUMBER.
        Returns:
        this.
